in_response_to.acknowledged: Reindex progress looks great - 9/15 collections done

message: QA testing complete! Found and fixed one bug. All core features working. Solr-dependent entity types blocked until reindex completes (as expected). How is the recording collection indexing going?

bug_fixed.fix: Updated API to return both fields for backwards compatibility
bug_fixed.commit: 24bc787 Add songwriter display and fix autocomplete API response format

requested_info: How is the recording collection indexing progressing?
notes: PostgreSQL fallback for artist searches is working well. Once Solr reindex completes, all entity types will be searchable.
